hero.title: Sustainable Aquaculture Solutions
hero.subtitle: Creating a better future for marine ecosystems

about.title: About Culiver
about.description: Culiver is a leading marine biotechnology company specializing in sustainable aquaculture solutions. We develop innovative products that improve aquatic health while minimizing environmental impact.

AboutSection.title: Core Business Areas
AboutSection.description: Culiver leads sustainable development in the aquaculture industry through advanced technology and eco-friendly solutions.

services.title: White Leg Shrimp Farming
services.description: We provide advanced farming systems for high-quality white leg shrimp production in optimized environments, managing everything from disease control to growth optimization.

services.title: Probiotic Feed Supplements
services.description: We develop and supply microbial products for water quality improvement and immune enhancement, with excellent effects on harmful bacteria suppression and digestive efficiency.

services.title: Smart Aquaculture Solutions
services.description: We optimize farm operations with IoT-based real-time monitoring systems and automation solutions, integrating water quality, feeding, and disease management.

topSection.title: Innovation Proven by Technology
topSection.description: Leading technological innovation in the aquaculture field through continuous research and development.

stats.label: Patents & IP Rights
stats.description: We hold numerous patents based on our innovative technology.

stats.label: R&D Projects
stats.description: Leading future technology through continuous R&D investment.

stats.label: Technology Partnerships
stats.description: Collaborating with leading domestic and international companies and institutions.

stats.label: Research Facilities
stats.description: Accelerating technological innovation through cutting-edge research facilities.

technologies.title: Core Technology Capabilities
technologies.description: Culiver creates a sustainable future through innovative technology.

items.title: Biofloc Farming Technology
items.description: Eco-friendly farming system using microorganisms to simultaneously improve water quality and productivity

items.title: Beneficial Microorganism Development
items.description: Specialized probiotics for shrimp farming that enhance immunity and promote growth

items.title: Smart Aquaculture System
items.description: Automated farming management system combining IoT and AI technologies to create an optimal farming environment

ProductsSection.title: Innovative Features of Smart Aquaculture
ProductsSection.description: Culiver's smart aquaculture system optimizes farming environments and maximizes productivity through cutting-edge IoT technology and big data analytics.

products.title: Real-time Water Quality Monitoring
products.description: Monitor key water quality indicators like pH, dissolved oxygen, temperature, and salinity 24/7 in real-time, with immediate alerts when anomalies occur.

products.title: Automated Feeding System
products.description: AI-based algorithms automatically adjust optimal feed amounts and cycles according to shrimp growth stages and activity levels.

products.title: Disease Prevention and Early Warning
products.description: Predict disease occurrence patterns through big data analysis and suggest preemptive countermeasures when anomalies are detected.

products.title: Cloud-based Remote Control
products.description: Check farm status and control systems remotely from anywhere, anytime through mobile devices.

TestimonialsSection.title: Culiver Stories
TestimonialsSection.description: Culiver connects imagination with reality, technology with life, and creates connections between people.

CTASection.title: We connect imagination with reality
CTASection.description: We connect imagination with reality, technology with life, and foster connections between people.
